title: Ideal Jawa owns brand Yezdi, rules Karnataka HC; asks liquidator to auction it
description: Justice SR Krishna Kumar, in a 90-page judgement dated December 16, permitted the official liquidator of Ideal Jawa to sell the trademark along with the associated goodwill through a public auction.
